# nango Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    nango = {
      source  = "contio.ai/contio/nango"
      version = "~> 1.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "nango" {
  environment_key = "your-nango-environment-key"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `environment_key` (String)
